Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
right of use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
Repayment of Debt: repayments of other short term debt
Stock Repurchases: accelerated payments for repurchase of common stock pending final settlement
payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from sale of accounts receivable originated at the entity
proceeds from sale of accounts receivable originated at third parties
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease excluding exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: change in accounts receivable originated at third parties
increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in other accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets
increase decrease in other noncurrent liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on loans held for sale consumer credit card
gain loss on sale of business
gains losses on extinguishment of debt

__unmapped__: income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
net cash provided by used in continuing operations
